feed.title: FitTrackee Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.7
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • PR#764 - New sport: Halfbike
  • PR#768 - add equipment (bike) to Halfbike workouts
  • PR#767 - Add averages in workouts list

Translations

  • PR#765 - Translations update (Dutch)

Translation status: - Basque: 81% - Bulgarian: 62% - Chinese (Simplified): 98% - Czech: 46% - Dutch: 98% - English: 100% - French: 100% - Galician: 98% - German: 98% - Italian: 51% - Norwegian Bokmål: 33% - Polish: 97% - Portuguese: 61% - Russian: 39% - Spanish: 63%

Thanks to the contributors: - @astridx - @JeroenED

[!NOTE] Note: This release contains database migration (see upgrade instructions in documentation)

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.8
entry.content:
Bugs Fixed

  • PR#779 - Fix segments navigation when user is not workout owner

Translations

  • PR#769 - Translations update (Chinese (Simplified Han script))
  • PR#770 - Translations update (Galician)
  • #773 - [translations request] Croatian
  • PR#774 - Translations update (Basque)

Thanks to the contributors: - @erral - @iggydev - @xmgz - Poesty Li

entry.title: New release for FitTrackee: v0.9.10
entry.content:
Features and enhancements

  • #795 - New sport: Windsurfing

Bugs Fixed

Translations
